{"id":447513877,"lang":"java","time":"1 year, 4 months","timestamp":1611555022,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/447513877/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Palindrome","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public boolean isPalindrome(String s) {\n        s.replaceAll(\"[^a-zA-Z0-9]\", \"\");\n        s = s.toLowerCase();\n        if (s==null|| s.length()==1){\n            return true;\n        }\n        else if (s.charAt(0)!=(s.charAt(s.length()-1))){\n            return false;\n            \n        }\n        else{\n            String t = s.substring(1,s.length()-1);\n            isPalindrome(t); \n        } \n        return true;\n        \n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-palindrome"}
